transformed_representation: 2. Explore the USGS's Landsat page for information on data access, user guides, and educational materials: [landast.usgs.gov](http://landast.usgs.gov)
1. Learn more about the Landsat program at NASA by visiting their website: [www.nasa.gov/landsat](http://www.nasa.gov/landsat)

As for the COVID-19 Data Pathfinder, it seems like an interesting resource that allows users to access datasets related to environmental factors during the pandemic. If you have any questions or would like more information on how to use the tool, feel free to ask!
Here are a few additional resources that might be helpful:

3. Check out NASA's Earth Observatory website for a wide range of satellite imagery and news stories about environmental changes around the world: [earthobservatory.nasa.gov](http://earthobservatory.nasa.gov)
llm_output:
It seems like you're interested in learning more about the Landsat program and its impact on our understanding of Earth. You've also explored some interesting examples of how satellite data is being used to study changes in the environment during the pandemic.

Here are a few additional resources that might be helpful:

1. Learn more about the Landsat program at NASA by visiting their website: [www.nasa.gov/landsat](http://www.nasa.gov/landsat)
2. Explore the USGS's Landsat page for information on data access, user guides, and educational materials: [landast.usgs.gov](http://landast.usgs.gov)
3. Check out NASA's Earth Observatory website for a wide range of satellite imagery and news stories about environmental changes around the world: [earthobservatory.nasa.gov](http://earthobservatory.nasa.gov)

As for the COVID-19 Data Pathfinder, it seems like an interesting resource that allows users to access datasets related to environmental factors during the pandemic. If you have any questions or would like more information on how to use the tool, feel free to ask!
